testcase.name: User makes the purchase
testcase.system-out: Given a web browser is at the SauceDemo home page...........................passed When the user enters the username "standard_user"...........................passed And the user enters the password "secret_sauce".............................passed And the user clicks the login button Login..................................passed When the users add to cart a "backpack".....................................passed Then the user go to cart....................................................passed And the user proceeds to checkout...........................................passed When the user fills in their information with "FirstName", "LastName", and "12345".passed And the user confirms the checkout..........................................passed And the user clicks the finish button.......................................passed Then the user sees the button Back Home.....................................passed
